template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a high-stakes professional task in {regulated_domain} that requires structured analysis, identifying risks or compliance issues, proposing revisions, and delivering both technical and executive summaries; output only the prompt text under 45 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a high-stakes professional task in financial audits that requires structured analysis, identifying risks or compliance issues, proposing revisions, and delivering both technical and executive summaries; output only the prompt text under 45 words.

message.content: Analyze this audit for fraud risks and compliance gaps, propose corrections, then provide both detailed and executive summaries.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, user wants a single-sentence prompt under 45 words for a high-stakes financial audit task. Need to include structured analysis, risk/compliance identification, revision proposals, and dual summaries. 

Financial audit context... high-stakes suggests fraud investigation or regulatory scrutiny. Compliance issues point to standards like GAAP or SOX. Technical and executive summaries must both be delivered. 

Can structure it as a direct instruction: "Analyze this financial audit for fraud risks and compliance gaps, propose corrections, then provide both detailed and executive summaries." That covers all elements concisely. Word count check: 20 words, under limit.
